summary: An architect supervising an exhibition starts to have mysterious stomach pains while his life slowly falls apart.
cast: Brian Dennehy|Chloe Webb|Lambert Wilson|Sergio Fantoni|Stefania Casini|Vanni Corbellini|Alfredo Varelli|Geoffrey Copleston|Francesco Carnelutti|Marino Mas√©|Marne Maitland|Claudio Spadaro|Rate Furlan|Julian Jenkins|Enrica Maria Scrivano|Ricardo Ussani|Stefano Gragnani|Andrea Prodan|Fabio Sartor
title: El vientre de un arquitecto
